UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: The Marine Antimicrobial Peptide AOD with Intact Disulfide Bonds Has Remarkable Antibacterial and Anti-Biofilm Activity
Literature.Author: Mao R, Zhao Q, Lu H, Yang N, Li Y, Teng D, Hao Y, Gu X, Wang J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus E48(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis G-81(MIC=>64µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>64µg/ml),Shigella flexneri CMCC 51571(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 21625(MIC=>64µg/ml)
